get.description:
List Servers.

*Notes*:
- The `host` of **sort_keys** is only used for admin/system_admin role users.
- The `name` is to support for fuzzy queries.

parameters.description: Only works when the all_projects filter is also specified.

schema.title: Project Id
schema.description: Only works when the all_projects filter is also specified.

parameters.name: project_id

parameters.description: Only works when the all_projects filter is also specified.

schema.title: Project Name
schema.description: Only works when the all_projects filter is also specified.

parameters.name: project_name

parameters.description: It will be ignored for non-admin user.

schema.title: Host
schema.description: It will be ignored for non-admin user.

parameters.name: host

get.description:
List Recycle Servers.

*Notes*:
- The `updated_at` of **sort_keys** is used as `deleted_at`.
- The `name` is to support for fuzzy queries.

parameters.description: Only works when the all_projects filter is also specified.

schema.title: Project Id
schema.description: Only works when the all_projects filter is also specified.

parameters.name: project_id

parameters.description: Only works when the all_projects filter is also specified.

schema.title: Project Name
schema.description: Only works when the all_projects filter is also specified.

parameters.name: project_name
